resource.name: UKCoreEthnicCategory
resource.title: UK Core Ethnic Category
resource.description: A ValueSet to identify the ethnicity of a Person, as specified by the Person. This vocabulary describes a person's ethnic category, it is an extension of the Ethnic Category Code described in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

contains.display: All republics which made up the former USSR
Other republics which made up the former Yugoslavia
Other white European, European unspecified, European mixed

text.div:
This value set contains 8 concepts

Expansion based on https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-NHSNumberVerificationStatus-1-0-0 version 1.0.0

All codes from system https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-NHSNumberVerificationStatus-1-0-0

CodeDisplayDefinition
01Number present and verified
02Number present but not traced
03Trace required
04Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found
05Trace needs to be resolved - (NHS number or patient detail conflict)
06Trace in progress
07Number not present and trace not required
08Trace postponed (baby under six weeks old)

resource.name: UKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
resource.title: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status
resource.description: A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code.

contains.display: Trace attempted - No match or multiple match found
Trace needs to be resolved - (NHS number or patient detail conflict)
Number not present and trace not required
Trace postponed (baby under six weeks old)

All codes from system https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/CodeSystem/UKCore-NHSDataDictionary-PersonStatedGender-1-0-0

CodeDisplayDefinition
1Male
2Female

resource.name: NHSDataModelandDictionaryPersonStatedGenderCode
resource.title: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Stated Gender Code
resource.description: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.

contains.display: Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female)
